text: Ronan the Accuser is a fictional character appearing in American comic books published by Marvel Comics. He first appeared in Fantastic Four #65 in 1967, created by writer Stan Lee and artist Jack Kirby. Ronan is a member of the Kree, an advanced alien race in the Marvel Universe, and serves as a high- ranking enforcer of Kree law. == Background == Ronan is primarily depicted as a complex character who embodies the Kree's militaristic and authoritative nature. He is known as an Accuser, which means he has the authority to judge and dispense justice in his own right. == Character development == Over the years, Ronan has been portrayed both as a villain and an anti-hero. His character often grapples with themes of loyalty to his people versus personal convictions. He has clashed with various Marvel superheroes, particularly the Fantastic Four and the Avengers, but he has also allied with them at times, particularly when it comes to threats against the universe. == Powers and abilities == Ronan possesses superhuman abilities, including enhanced strength, stamina, and durability. He is also a formidable combatant skilled in hand-to-hand combat and has access to advanced Kree technology, including energy projection weapons and starships. == Key storylines == Ronan has appeared in numerous storylines across various comics, becoming involved in significant arcs involving the Kree-Skrull War and the broader cosmic landscape of the Marvel Universe. He has also been featured in crossover events where he sometimes takes on roles that challenge his initial portrayal as a stern enforcer. == In other media == Ronan the Accuser was featured in the Marvel Cinematic Universe (MCU), notably in the movie Guardians of the Galaxy (2014), where he was portrayed by Lee Pace. In this portrayal, he is depicted as a radical Kree who seeks to destroy Xandar (the home of the Nova Corps) and has allied himself with Thanos, though he later rejects Thanos's authority. Overall, Ronan the Accuser is a significant character within the Marvel cosmic hierarchy, known for his powerful presence and complex motivations. Category:Marvel Comics characters
